text: Hofheim in Unterfranken ) is a city in Haßberge, Unterfranken, Bavaria in Germany. The municipality consists of the town of Hofheim and the villages of Eichelsdorf, Erlsdorf, Goßmannsdorf, Lendershausen, Manau, Ostheim, Reckertshausen, Rügheim and Sulzbach. ==References== Category:Haßberge (district)
title: Hofheim, Bavaria
